summary: A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.
cast: Andy Lau|Tony Chiu-Wai Leung|Anthony Chau-Sang Wong|Eric Tsang|Kelly Chen|Sammi Cheng|Edison Chen|Shawn Yue|Elva Hsiao|Chapman To|Ka Tung Lam|Ting Yip Ng|Dion Lam|Chi Keung Wan|Hui Kam Fung|Tony Ho|Courtney Wu|Hin-Wai Au|Eric Tin Cheung Li|Wong Yin Keung|Lam Po Loy|Wing Yee Cheng|Man-Kei Yiu|Yuen Waj Ho|Wai-Kwok Mak|Kui Mei Yee|Chi-Wang Wong|Lee Yip Kin|Chung Wai Ho|Sai Tang Yu|Kam Hung Wong|Wai-Nam So|Chi-Wai Lai|Jerry Leung|Tze Ming Lee|Hui On Tat|Ho Wing Ling|Wah-Chu Lee|Yuk-San Cheung|Chiu Yi Leung|Chaucharew Wichai|Wai-Ho Yuen
title: Juego sucio
